title: So, I was recently banned (14 days) and went to support. What a travesty.
body:
I pretty much said everything in the screenshots, but this entire ticket has been one hot mess. Going into this, I was aware that support did not read tickets or merely glimpsed at it.

https://i.gyazo.com/8c96ad0d841e5cc2fe1744f9f9f66049.png

[SS REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)]

For laughs, seeing as he did not get 14 day banned and did worse than me in two different games.

I do not think I have ever seen a more incompetent group of people in my life. Not to mention that each response was by a different person and that one response where the person obviously did not read. :(
